data.title: Nobel Prize - Awards, Sciences, Peace
data.meta_description: Nobel Prize - Awards, Sciences, Peace: Each Nobel Prize consists of a gold medal, a diploma bearing a citation, and a sum of money, the amount of which depends on the income of the Nobel Foundation. A Nobel Prize is either given entirely to one person, divided equally between two persons, or shared by three persons. In the latter case, each of the three persons can receive a one-third share of the prize or two together can receive a one-half share. Sometimes a prize is withheld until the following year; if not then awarded, it is paid back into the funds, which happens also when a
